item.title: Hypothesizing and Concluding
item.description:
Hypothesizing and Concluding

In this section, we're going to learn how to make hypotheses and reach conclusions using: 「とする」 and 「わけ」（訳）.

item.title: The End of the World (世界の果てまで）
item.description:
The End of the World (世界の果てまで）

なぜ太陽は輝き続けるの。なぜ海は浜辺に打り寄せるの。世界の終わりを知らないのかしら？だからあなたは私をもう愛していないから。なぜ鳥たちは歌い続けるの。なぜ

item.title: 10+ Fun Sites for JLPT Reading Practice Online | Wander Tokyo
item.description:
10+ Fun Sites for JLPT Reading Practice Online | Wander Tokyo

One of the most difficult aspects of the Japanese Language Proficiency Test (JLPT) is the reading comprehension () section. At my old job in the US, I had a lot of downtime and decided I'd use that time to brush up on my Japanese reading.

item.title: アニメ・マンガの日本語 Japanese in Anime & Manga
item.description:
アニメ・マンガの日本語　Japanese in Anime & Manga

This is an e-learning site that offers a fun way to learn a number of character/genre-based Japanese expressions that appear in anime and manga.

item.title: nihongo den: JLPT N3 Practice Tests

nihongo den: JLPT N3 Practice Tests

jlpt n3 study material, jlpt n3 sample tests, jlpt n3 example exam, jlpt n3 sample exam, jlpt n3 past papers, jlpt n3 previous exam, jlpt n3 study guide

item.title: Japanese-Language Proficiency Test Official Practice Workbook | JLPT Japanese-Language Proficiency Test
item.description:
Japanese-Language Proficiency Test Official Practice Workbook | JLPT Japanese-Language Proficiency Test

For all levels, the workbook contains almost the same number of questions as an actual test, with questions selected from among those used in 2010 and 2011 tests. This is the first official practice workbook for the JLPT since the 2010 revision.
